title: My WSSCA table: Still open for business 40+ HOFers, tough backs
author: Luke

posts.post_title: My WSSCA table: Still open for business 40+ HOFers, tough backs
posts.post_content:
***THIS LOT IS ON HOLD***
If you are interested in any card(s) send me a PM and I will get back to you if the lot doesn't end up selling.






Here is my Southern Leaguer thread in case you missed it:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=196345[/url]

I got home from setting up at a show for the weekend, and I'm still in the selling mood. They are all individually priced. I priced them all to have a little room for negotiation. Some have only a tiny bit of room, while others have a little more. Feel free to shoot me an offer. PM is fine, email also works. [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url] I'm not looking to give them away, as they can just go into my ebay store if they don't sell. But I would definitely prefer to move them.  Please let me know if you'd like additional/better scans or pics of any of these cards.

Shipping is $3

I'll answer all emails and PMs in the order received, and obviously a commitment to buy takes precedence over any negotiation or pending offer.

Thanks for looking!

These cards have been sold:
Joss
Tinker hands on knees
Jennings 2 hands showing PB $59
Overall Tolstoi
Merkle OM
Krause epdg
Maloney cycle
Cassidy AB
Raymond AB
Kelley William Born 11/6
